title: Alex Caruso On What Exactly Happened In Free Agency That Led Him To Leave The Lakers For The Bulls
author: JJ Redick
description:
Alex Caruso joins JJ Redick and Tommy Alter this week on The Old Man and The Three. Tonight's preview clip is about Alex's free agency journey and what ultimately led him to choose to leave The Los Angeles Lakers to play for The Chicago Bulls. The full episode drops tomorrow!

Subscribe to The Old Man and The Three w/ JJ Redick and Tommy Alter on Apple and Spotify. Also watch JJ on ESPN's First Take this morning.
